entry.title: Taproot (and graftroot) complexity
entry.summary: A new member of a Bitcoin development mailing list has posted a question regarding the "in-reply-to" header, stating that they are unsure whether it is misbehaving. The original thread discusses the complexity of Taproot and Graftroot in Bitcoin development. In a recent message from Jay Berg via bitcoin-dev on behalf of the group, a question was asked regarding the reuse of keys in Taproot utxos. Specifically, if reusing keys in Taproot has different security/privacy implications than Pay-to-PubKey-Hash, or if they are similar. The post concludes with the standard information for the Bitcoin development mailing list.
